Description:
Detects potential DLL sideloading of DLLs that are part of antivirus software suchas McAfee, Symantec...etc

Author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems), Wietze Beukema (project and research)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Potential Antivirus Software DLL Sideloading
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where ((image_loaded like '%\log.dll' and  not ((process_path = 'c:\program files\dell\saremediation\audit\telemetryutility.exe' and (image_loaded = 'c:\program files\dell\saremediation\plugin\log.dll' or image_loaded = 'c:\program files\dell\saremediation\audit\log.dll')) or image_loaded like 'c:\program files\canon\myprinter\%' or (image_loaded like 'c:\program files\bitdefender antivirus free\%' or image_loaded like 'c:\program files (x86)\bitdefender antivirus free\%'))) or (image_loaded like '%\qrt.dll' and  not (image_loaded like 'c:\program files\f-secure\anti-virus\%' or image_loaded like 'c:\program files (x86)\f-secure\anti-virus\%')) or ((image_loaded like '%\ashldres.dll' or image_loaded like '%\lockdown.dll' or image_loaded like '%\vsodscpl.dll') and  not (image_loaded like 'c:\program files\mcafee\%' or image_loaded like 'c:\program files (x86)\mcafee\%')) or (image_loaded like '%\vftrace.dll' and  not (image_loaded like 'c:\program files\cyberark\endpoint privilege manager\agent\x32\%' or image_loaded like 'c:\program files (x86)\cyberark\endpoint privilege manager\agent\x32\%')) or (image_loaded like '%\wsc.dll' and  not (image_loaded like 'c:\program files\avast software\avast\%' or image_loaded like 'c:\program files (x86)\avast software\avast\%')) or (image_loaded like '%\tmdbglog.dll' and  not (image_loaded like 'c:\program files\trend micro\titanium\%' or image_loaded like 'c:\program files (x86)\trend micro\titanium\%')) or (image_loaded like '%\dlpprem32.dll' and  not (image_loaded like 'c:\program files\eset%' or image_loaded like 'c:\program files (x86)\eset%')))
